name: Sapling Yew
descriptions: Sapling Yew is a bright young girl living in Oasis in the year 2277.

She is the only child of the Oasis village leaders, Tree Father Birch and Leaf Mother Laurel. She does gardening with her mother and enjoys playing in the grove, climbing on and around the god-spirit, and touching her bear charm. She is the closest thing to a friend Harold has among the Treeminders, by virtue of being the only one who actually listens to him.
Yew is the common name for genus Taxus, a type of tree and with "sapling" meaning a young tree. All of the human residents in Oasis have horticultural names.

topics.response_text: You big dummy! Now we gotta wait for another Outsider!

topics.topic: MS10FinTLRewardTree Father Birch said you may have a gift for me?
topics.topic_text: I hear you may have a gift for me?
topics.response_text: Yeah, I think you're pretty swell for someone from Out There! And... and you were really nice to me too.

topics.topic_text: What's your opinion of Tree Father Birch and Leaf Mother Laurel?
Any information you could give me on the caves below Oasis would be helpful.
topics.response_text: My parents told me never to go past the old gate... there are monsters in there!
Now that Harold's gone, I lost my bestest friend! All I want to do is cry!
Oh, you mean Harold? He's really nice. Sometimes when I get really lonely, I go into the Grove and talk to him.

topics.topic_text: Did you know your god wants to die?
topics.response_text: What?! How can you say something so awful and terrible?! Leave me alone, I never wanna talk to you again!

topics.topic_text: Hey, maybe if you tell me what Harold is scared of I won't be scared either.
topics.response_text: Awww, I never knew an Outsider could be scared of anything!

topics.topic_text: Tell me, too! Then I won't be scared either.
topics.response_text: Awww, I never knew an Outsider could be scared of anything!
Sorry, that's only for secrets between friends!

topics.topic_text: I can't believe a tree would be scared of anything.
topics.response_text: Hey! He's not a tree! He's my friend! Don't be mean.

topics.topic_text: Yeah, well guess what? He's really a monster!
topics.response_text: Hey! He's not a monster! You meanie! I never wanna talk to you again!

topics.topic_text: So, how did you end up here?
What did you have to do to become a Treeminder?
topics.response_text: Just get born I guess. He he! You're funny!
Sorry, that's only for secrets between friends!

conversation.response_text: You stupid-head! I can't believe you mouthed off to the Tree Father.
All this may He be so good as to grant us, who is to come to judge the living and the dead, and the world by his verdure.
